headline: Behr Paint Company Launches BEHR PREMIUM PLUS® ECOMIX™ Plant-Based* Paint & Primer
summary: Today, Behr Paint Company announced the launch of BEHR PREMIUM PLUS® ECOMIX™ Plant-Based* Paint & Primer, an innovative paint and primer that combines positive environmental benefits with high-performance and durability. This plant-based* product is part of Behr Paint Company's efforts to deliver on all fronts: performance, durability, low emissions, zero VOC^, and renewable content.

headline: Masco Corporation to Participate in a Fireside Chat at an Investor Conference
summary: LIVONIA, Mich., November 03, 2025--Masco Corporation (NYSE: MAS) announced today that Rick Westenberg, Vice President, Chief Financial Officer and Treasurer, will participate in a fireside chat at the Baird 2025 Global Industry Conference in Chicago, Illinois on Wednesday, November 12 at 11:15 a.m. ET.
